professional_summary: Highly experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in large-scale database management, replication, and disaster recovery solutions. Proficient in GoldenGate, Exadata, Veridata, and Data Guard technologies. Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on optimizing database performance and ensuring high availability.

key_responsibilities: Support and maintain Oracle 11g RAC on Oracle Database File System (DBFS).
Install and configure Oracle GoldenGate 10g for data replication.
Implement backup strategies using RMAN
O/S
and logical backups.
Install and configure Grid Infrastructure for Oracle database 11g Release 2 RAC.
Create and manage stored procedures and triggers in the database.
Perform user management tasks including creation
monitoring
and altering passwords.
Tune and optimize GoldenGate parameters on Extract
Pump
and Replicat processes.
Perform initial load for GoldenGate replication using Export-Import
Data Pump
and RMAN.
Install and configure GoldenGate for Java with JMS Pump to generate JMS messages.
Implement multiple GoldenGate instances across Dev
QA
and Prod environments.
Respond and work with Application Development teams for database support.
Schedule jobs to run on daily/weekly/monthly basis using Crontab.
Backup strategies and planning using RMAN
O/S
and logical backups.
Data replication and disaster recovery solutions with Oracle GoldenGate.
Database performance optimization and high availability implementation.
Database performance optimization and query tuning.
Implementation of high availability and disaster recovery solutions.
Monitoring and maintenance of Oracle databases.
